'sudo ln -s [target] [link]'

ln -s /home/user/public_html /var/www ?

you can't make a symlink if a directory already exists with that name; and what you are describing is not really good practice for Apache
for clarity you should have things under /var/www
may i kindly suggest joining #apache for specific recommendations for your case
